resources.string: How fast can you fizz Buzz?

You'll be shown 10 random numbers between 1 and 1000. 
 If the number is divisible by 3, enter fizz. 
 If the number is divisible by 5, enter buzz. 
 If the number is divisble by 3 and 5, enter fizz buzz.
 If it does not meet any of the above, enter not fizz buzz
